footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Cyno | Update Date: 10/26/2022 | Editor: Luanjo#5886

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Cyno has access to a plethora of **Electro flexes**. He benefits from units who have **lower field time requirements—as to not compete with his own**; and **abilities that have some sort of off-field presence**, whether it be Damage, Energy Particles generation or Healing. Examples being: **Fischl, Kuki, Beidou, Yae, and Dori**.

Dendro being a novelty means **Dendro flexes** are scarce. Thankfully, between the characters readily available, Cyno is able to synergize with both the **Dendro Traveler** and **Collei**, who are also **free units**.

**Hydro flexes** include **Xingqiu, Yelan, Kokomi and Barbara**.

**Anemo flexes** can be picked up for their grouping/buffing/healing capabilities—**Kazuha, Sucrose, Heizou, Sayu, Jean, Anemo Traveler**.
